Text: Revised IT and Gas Logistics Plan Schedules Cc Tracy Please delete the other files I sent previously These schedules have no normalization in the Plan and CE per Rods request Please call me if you have any questions Thanks Nancy
IT again Cc Sorry I found a typo while doing my variances Youll need to use this schedule Nancy

IT OM Schedule for Cc Tracy Caroline said she owes you lunch for being late Actually we were on time we just had alot of late changes and the NBPL numbers from Omaha came in yesterday late Enough excuses let Caroline take you to lunch and make her take you somewhere nicer than the TacoBell drive through Thanks Nancy

IT CE vs Plan Cc James For NNG IT the Capital is up MM due to new projects and new business For NNG TW the primary explanations for the net increases in Direct Support are Risk Management moved from Commercial to IT MM SAN MM OE Additional Support staff and new software MM Amortization Future Vision Projects MM EPSC MM Totals to MM The FAA ETS Support variance Measurement is incorrect on the worksheet CE is MM Plan is MM Ill get Gas Logistics to you soon Thanks Nancy

Gas Logistics CE vs Plan Cc James I believe the Communications for should be MM in NNGs Gas Logistics Anyway NNG increase is due primarily to EPSC Less Capitalized Increase in Benefits Increase in Salaries Hope this helps Nancy

FW Gas Logistics CE vs Plan Cc FYIthe budget for Communications is in Gas Logistics in Adaytum Please let me know if you need it moved Thanks Nancy Original Message From Barnes Caroline Sent Wednesday October AM To Carpenter Nancy Subject RE Gas Logistics CE vs Plan We need to let Tracy and James know that so they can move it where ever it belongs cvb Original Message From Carpenter Nancy Sent Wednesday October AM To Barnes Caroline Subject RE Gas Logistics CE vs Plan NoWe included it in Adaytum because we werent sure where it would go and wanted to be sure the costs were included in the Plan Original Message From Barnes Caroline Sent Wednesday October AM To Carpenter Nancy Subject RE Gas Logistics CE vs Plan Communications for is moving out of Gas Logistics into somewhere else Did we remove it from Gas Logistics cvb Original Message From Carpenter Nancy Sent Tuesday October PM To Weitekamp James Geaccone Tracy Cc Scott Donna Barnes Caroline Subject Gas Logistics CE vs Plan Importance High James I believe the Communications for should be MM in NNGs Gas Logistics Anyway NNG increase is due primarily to EPSC Less Capitalized Increase in Benefits Increase in Salaries Hope this helps Nancy
Revised Gas LogisticsTracy I revised the Actuals Thanks Nancy

FW TimekeepingOriginal Message From Carpenter Nancy Sent Tuesday December PM To Dietz Rick Winters Ricki Cc Barnes Caroline Scott Donna Subject Timekeeping Importance High Several of your cost centers have nonpayroll costs trailing payroll to work orders In order to maintain the integrity of the true capital costs time coded outside your home cost center must be recorded to a FAR order or specific project not a cost center Please remind your timekeepers or anyone responible for coding timesheets Thank you Nancy
